Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.Slice

  • Packages that use Slice 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util
    The Assembly util package contains utility classes that are useful for working with general assembly data regardless of what assembler was used or file format the data is in.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus
    The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util

      Slice SliceBuilder.build()
      Create a new instance using the data collected by this builder thus far.
      Slice SliceMap.getSlice(long offset) 
      Constructors in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util with parameters of type Slice 
      Constructor and Description
      SliceBuilder(Slice slice)
      Create a new SliceBuilder which will start off containing the same SliceElements as the given Slice.
      SliceBuilder(Slice slice, SliceBuilder.SliceElementFilter filter)
      Create a new SliceBuilder which will start off containing the only the SliceElements from the given Slice that are accepted by the SliceElementFilter.
